name: Baldi Loves Cap'N Crunch
description:
Mod Created By: TraumnYaumn

"Baldi Loves Cap'N Crunch"

Mod Inspired By "Crunchy" By C&D Carboard Games.

----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

W,S = Move On Z Axis

A,D = Move On X Axis

Scroll Wheel + 1,2,3 = Navigate In Inventory

Space Bar = Look Behind You & Jump On Jumprope

Left Shift - Sprint

----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Story:

On 4/10/99, Baldi Acquired A Taste For Cap'N Crunch.

Today; 4/12/99, It Was Just Another Monday But Baldi Had An Extreme Addiction To Cap'N Crunch. 

There Were Boxes Of Cap'N In Basically Every Room. Baldi Would Get A Temper If We Ever Messed With Them.

I Hadn't Eaten In Awhile And I'm Feeling Quite Famished, Maybe He Wouldn't Mind If I Had Just A Handfull.

Well, Then Again He Has An Eagle When It Comes To Messing With His Cap'N Crunch. When I Say He Has An Extreme Addiction I Don't 

Mean A Hyperbole, Quaker Oats Literally Almost Stopped Manufacturing The Product Cause Of High Demands.

Yesterday Baldi Ordered So Much Cap'N Crunch, The Company Banned Him So He Is Kinda Moody, So I Have To Try To Get On His Good Side.

Hopefully He Won't Notice His Cereal Will Be Stolen.

----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Baldi Sure Is A Strange Fellow, He Will Chase You Around The Scoolhouse If You Steal His Cereal.

Playtime Is A Weird Person, Even Though She Has Poor Eyesight She Still Manages To Spot And Track You Down, Just To Play A Game Of Jumprope

Principal Of The Thing Is A Pretty Unrealistic Principal, He Will Put You In Detention If You Break Any Rules Like Running, But He Will ACTUALLY Send The Bully In Detintion

It's A Bully Likes Cap'N Crunch Too?, Make Sure He Doesn't Steal "Your" Cap'N Crunch.

Art's And Crafters Is A Weird Creature, If You Acquire All 7 Boxes Of Cap'N Crunch He Will Send You To Baldi. You Having Cap'N Crunch And Baldi Don't Mix Very Well.

Gotta Sweep Is Just A School Janitor, Who Is A Broom? That's A Plot Twist. But He Will Clean Anything In Its Path, Including You, Baldi, The Principal, Art's And Crafters, You Name It.

----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

The Special Carbonated Milk When Shakin' Will Spray So, Use It Wisely

The Box Of Cap'N Crunch Will Refuel Your Stanima

Lock Will Lock Up The Big Yellow Doors, Giving You Some Time To Escape

Scissors Will Cut Playtimes Jumprope So You Can Avoid Baldi's Wrath

WD-69 Will Quiet A Classroom Door So Baldi Won't Know Where You Are

Baldi's Cap'N Crunch Mixtape Will Play Baldi's Favorite Song And He Will Listen To The Song And Not Pay Attention To You

Clock When It Goes Off And You Are Not In Baldi's Sightline, Baldi Will Go To The Clock.

Well The Other Stuff Are Pretty Useless.

----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Credits:

TraumnYaumn - Voice For Baldi, Playtime, Bully, Gotta Sweep, And Art's And Crafters

TraumnYaumn - Modding Textures

mystman12 - The Actual Original Game

----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Paint3D - Textures

Google/Bing - Textures

Voice Changer With Effects (Android Application) - Recording Voices

Multiple Games - SFX

dnSpy - Modifying Code

UnityEx - Impoting/Exporting Sounds And Textures (If You Get The Error "Sound Packing Available In 

Ultimate Version Than Use The 1.9.0.6 Version Of UnityEx.)

----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Thanks For Playing This Mod.

Sub To Me On YT (TraumnYaumn).
